start.text: You are a citizen in a dystopian society where everyone is assigned a role. You have been assigned the role of a historian, but you dream of a life of freedom. One day, you discover a hidden passage that might lead to the outside world.

choices.text: Ignore the passage and continue your life

passage.text: The passage leads you to a hidden community of rebels. They offer you a chance to join them and fight for freedom. You can either join the rebellion or return to your assigned role.

ignore.text: You live the rest of your life in the gilded cage, always wondering what could have been.

rebellion.text: You join the rebellion and become a key figure in the fight for freedom. You have brought hope to the people!

return.text: You return to your role, but you are discovered and executed for your defiance. Your adventure ends here.
